Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Reroute at Harlem/Armitage
ShortDescription: 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, North ave, Oak Park, Grand, and Harlem due to, street blockage near Harlem/Armitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harlem, North ave, Oak Park, Grand, and Harlem, due to street blockage near Harlem/Armitage.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Addison/Janssen
ShortDescription: Westbound 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, South Port, Irving Park, Ashland, and Addison, due to street blockage near Addison/Janssen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, South Port, Irving Park, Ashland, and Addison, due to street blockage near Addison/Janssen.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lawndale/32nd
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park and 26th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park and 26th due to street blockage near Lawndale/32nd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
